name: GO
product_desc:
AgriGO empower small holder farmer to grow financially by allowing them to create financial footprint and use their farming data to access finance.  A small holder farmer who use our application is able to keep records of his daily activities and its costs, while receiving personalized  agricultural advisory services to his mobile. 

When opening account of AgriGO using USSD, *850# the farmer has option to select which bank/financial institution he want to work with among our partners, then the journey of financial inclusion start from there. We use our credit scoring which look at his behavior towards our recommandation, his cost of projection, projected harvest, his location and soil nutrients and external facts such as weathers, production index of crops in the region, currency inflation, unemployment rate, current price of commodities,...
high_concept: Credit line for farmers-CreditCard
markets: Big Data Analytics, Fin Tech

name: E-shyura
product_desc:
E-shyura is an innovative mobile payment through USSD shot code or an Android Application based changing the way of payment in business done in Rwanda.The purpose of E-shyura is to provide a Cashless product on the market for Customers. E-shyura is a Mobile system of payment which will facilitate customers to pay bills from their Bank Account using a USSD shot code for normal phone or an Appli for smartphone.
Payments are only done using Card on a PoS(Point of Sale) (VISA, Mastercard, etc.) and By Mobile money using a USSD Shot code.
Card can be damaged (Magnetic Strip, chip), Customer can forget the Card, Card can be expired, Customer may not have money on the Mobile Money Account, etc.
E-shyura will allow direct payment without using card payment without PoS or Mobile Money. Only a Mobile Telephone having a SIM Card of the Mobile Number linked to the Bank Account is required to make the payment and to close the transaction.
high_concept: E-payment using a phone linked to a bank account
markets: Mobile, E-Commerce, Business Services, Customer Service

name: Starlight
product_desc:
Our products include in-door solar lights that help student in their studies during night and automatic out-door solar lights that light the outside of houses and farms.

Our customers are off-grid rural population in Rwanda that are not able to afford other solar systems that are on the market. They are mainly located in Northern and Eastern Province in Rwanda. 

Our Starlight STEM program, is a new educational program under Starlight for girls at O and A level grade that combines real world social entrepreneurship with experiential STEM learning. This is done in STEM clubs that we establish in girls high schools.
high_concept: Cheap, local made Solar lights.
markets: Clean Energy, Commercial Solar, Teaching STEM Concepts

name: Compound55
product_desc:
Startup movements have been growing across the world, and Africa is not left out. African countries are amongst those with the highest ranking on people having their own enterprise, creating opportunities for employment growth, wealth creation, and reinventing the continent’s problems into solutions. 

Startup Compound is a platform that provides expertise, tips, and resources needed to build a successful business anywhere. Whether you are thinking of starting a business, scaling up your business or you are a high growth company, we help you stay connected with top notch local content from inside the region delivered straight to your inbox and keep you updated about the startup scene in Africa. 

From best business practices to design thinking & adapting to digital innovation, our team will bring to you the best content on topics and industries you care about.
high_concept: A social enterprise that harnesses the power of connecting people and communities.

name: Happening
product_desc:
Happening a social media app with a twist . It helps u see whats happening around you in your city. With all its content created by its users, Happening has the potential to be a media platform like no other

It is all about sharing moments. Users create plans that they and other users can post into.
It helps you share moments with followers and explore whats happening around you

There is no one way to use happening:
-You can use it to promote events, parties, conferences, festivals etc. To see "what the plan is" or "whats happening"
-You can use it to showcase national landmarks. To showcase your business services or products if your an entrepreneur 
-If you love taking pictures and categorizing them by subject matter, you can also use it

The concept is simple and the goal is to execute it with charm in a manner that is convenient and adaptable to users

Its currently on the apple app store: https://appsto.re/us/y6hogb.i with android coming late september and web later 2017

name: MindSky
product_desc:
MindSky’s first software product is a career platform that provides users with critical career development skills and simplifies the internship and job search process with individualized job recommendations and training. The software moved from concept to market in less than six months of development time and currently has over 5,000 job seekers and 100 paying employer clients.

Additional products will include tools for recruitment and admissions, learner management, curriculum delivery, and student loan management. These products are designed and built to address the needs and limitations of edge-of-the-internet users: digital non-natives in low-bandwidth environments and using mobile devices.
high_concept: Full Stack Education Technology Company for Emerging Markets
markets: Education, Software, Edtech

name: EarthEnable
product_desc: EarthEnable provides an affordable alternative to dirt floors: locally sourced, earthen floors that are 75% cheaper than a concrete floor. Our floors are made by hand with a mixture of compressed earthen materials – gravel, sand, clay – and are then sealed with a drying oil. EarthEnable has made this earthen floors feasible in Rwanda by developing a proprietary process to cost-effectively convert any locally available, unsaturated oil into a drying oil, developing a training curriculum that equips masons with the skills to install high-quality earthen floors, and developing a distribution model to scale without sacrificing quality.  Our business enables the developing world to shift to proven, affordable, and green construction technologies while improving health; a significant improvement over the status quo.
high_concept: Low-cost flooring to improve health outcomes
markets: Healthcare, Construction, International Development

name: IRIBA Clean Water Delivery
product_desc:
IRIBA Clean Delivery Ltd is a private corporation that aims at providing affordable clean water in too remote communities to water scarcity. This company has been established in June 2015 by Yvette Ishimwe who is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of this company. IRIBA Clean Water Delivery Ltd.’s head office is located in Kayonza district/Eastern Province of Rwanda.
Vision
We envision an Africa where every person has easy access to reliable and safe water for drinking and household activities.
IRIBA Clean Water Delivery Ltd.’s exist is to promote and ensure the sustainability, easy and affordable accessibility of clean water for drinking and household activities.
Core Values
Innovation: To innovate and design authentic customer based solutions
Courage: To initiate and take a lead in tackling water challenges in African communities
Empowerment: We aim at empowering young generation through the provision of guidance and employment opportunities.
high_concept: Authentic Clean and Affordable water services in too remote communities.
markets: Hospitals, High Schools

name: Change Life Organization
product_desc:
Change Life Organization

Change Life Organization is a relief and humanitarian development organization that aims at working to bring change in the lives of most vulnerable people and their communities.

The Organization assists individuals and families and as well as their communities to tackle the problems of poverty and address them. It also goes beyond and advocate for the rights of children and women for their potentials and participation in their full development and seek to empower youth for their future.

The Organization mobilizes all people in different categories to make changes where necessary so as to ensure a better future.
 
Vision

The dignity and the well-being of the poorest and the most vulnerable people and the development of their communities.

Mission

To mobilize and help people especially the poorest and the most vulnerable people and their communities in promoting their cultural, social, economic and environmental change for their well being.

It has successfully brought capacity building programs to 600 farmers and it intends to develop 1000 more. RHEPI will therefore create a private entity to collect and pack farmers produce(Fine Beans, Mangetoute and Sugar Snaps) for sale to internal and external markets. The supply side of the Fresh Produce industry operates in a fairly standard manner. Product is grown on farms, large or small and collected or centralized at pack houses where the product is graded, cooled, packed and shipped.

AMADARA Fresh Produce will attach growers to markets and deliver to RHEPI developmental returns as regards building growers incomes and it will be profitable so as to create a good base for growth which will multiply the developmental goods.

name: BIOCOOP
product_desc:
BIOCOOP is integrating biodiversity conservation and economic development of the people around Nyungwe National Park. This Park faces the challenges of poaching and bush fires caused by the local communities because they are very poor. People spread invasive tree species in the past years. Invasive species constitute a serious threat to native biodiversity and ecosystem functioning in Nyungwe National Park; however, they are a potential source of income generation and livelihood enhancement for the local poor people living around the
Park. The aim of this project is creating a win-win situation (where both the ecosystem and local people will have equal benefits) through eradication of exotic plant species, job creation,
and timber provision to local poor people living in high risk zones around the Park. We sell timbers and poles to the companies and the money we get is deposited on our Conservation Fund. We provide loans to ex-poachers and pay off the loan with small interest rate.
high_concept: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HomZ1DwELqk&feature=youtube_gdata_player
markets: Small Companies

The name 25Cipher originates from the East African country codes which all begin with ‘25’ while the cipher initially means a ‘zero’ which ends up as ‘250 (Rwandan area code)’ but also on another note, cipher also means ‘secret’, resulting into ’25 Secret’ as we believe that we shall have the secret amongst the area codes of ’25’ in what we strive to do.

25Cipher is set to launch in the creative arts, entertainment and sports industry of Rwanda. 

With its basis on promotion i.e. Concerts, artists etc. 

Not only will 25Cipher have interests in busines aide of things but also our Philanthropic interests through our charity body; 25Cipher Chairty Sports Aid

name: AkilahNet
product_desc:
Hiring great teams is not easy. It is one of the main challenges we faced at our sister company, the Akilah Institute. We received hundreds or thousands of applications for every job opening, many from unqualified candidates.

We’ve created a solution — AkilahNet – an exclusive talent community of top candidates with access to the best jobs and opportunities in Rwanda. Our mission is to connect employers to vetted professionals, simplifying the hiring process and making it easier for talented people to build great careers.

AkilahNet’s talent marketplace is much more than a typical job board, where any company can post, and anyone can apply. At AkilahNet, we screen candidates to identify excellence, work ethic, and social aptitude. If accepted onto AkilahNet, we match them with job opportunities at companies we personally vet to ensure they are legitimate. When hiring managers receive applications from AkilahNet candidates, they pay extra attention.
high_concept: East Africa's members-only career marketplace for top-tier talent.
markets: News, Human Resources, Advising And Career Services

name: Mercatores Enterprises
product_desc: Our activities  focuss  on  paper  recycling  and  the  production  of paper  bags  and  cardboard boxes. In 2005, both the city  of  San  Francisco and  the  govenment  of  Rwanda  banned  the  use  of  polyethylene  bags. Since  then,  all  packaging products  used  in  this African  country  are  imported from neigboring, Kenya  and  far  East  Asia like China, UAE, Sir LANKA, etc. This  makes  the  lives  in  that  developing country  very  expensive.  A survey  made  in 2012  revealed that the  imports  of  paper  packaging  products  were up  to USD 28 million. Then company conceived an idea  to  start a paper  recycling  plant  to  mitigate these  improts. Banks  are  willing  to provide  a  loan up to USD 1,748,528. The  balance  to  make  this  project operational  is 1,000,000USD which  we are  looking  from  investors. A design  of the  factory  is already  complete and  we  are  looking  for a potential investor for this business generating a net profit of USD 2M yearly.
high_concept: cardboard boxes and paper bags replacing plastic bags for the whole territory of Rwanda
markets: Packaging Supplies

product_desc:
The Cosmos App called MBEHO is an Android application that will help pregnant women to register according to their term of pregnancy and receive advice and alert messages related on their pregnancy, listening to inspirational messages for their babies, and this app will use a GPS to help users search for nearby doctor or specialist with a bonus of first aid support call for free. Customers are mostly pregnant women and parents in general. 
MBEHO is unique; it is the only mobile application for maternal and child health information in Rwanda and the only app to use inspirational audio and photo-novellas to communicate through stories, which will reach customers who are illiterate, too.
MBEHO will be user friendly and easy to use.
high_concept: Mobile application for safe pregnancy
markets: Mobile, Mobile Advertising, Mobile Application

name: SafeMotos
product_desc:
Irish Incorporated SafeMotos is one of East Africa's most exciting startups. We are an Uber for motorcycle taxis that uses telematic data from our drivers smartphones to gauge how drivers drive, then connect customers to our safest drivers. This is a major issue as motorcycle taxis are the most popular way to travel in many African cities.

Having performed more than 50,000 trips in since we launched in July 2015, and 45,000 of those trips coming since January 2016, SafeMotos is proud to be in a traction stage and is seeking for investment to carry us through this stage without the distraction of raising a Series A.

Having raised the most money for a Seed round in Rwanda's history, being the first startup in Rwanda to win East Africa's PIVOT East Competition, and been featured in the Guardian, Tech Crunch, CNBC Africa we know Africa and are looking for strategic investors to help us dominate our market.
high_concept: Safer Uber for African motorcycle taxis
markets: Transportation, East Africa, Public Safety, Motorcycle Taxi

name: Sokkaa
product_desc:
Sokkaa is a growing Pan-African community of over 2.3M football fans. 

Our success is built on original African content, conversation, and daily fantasy gaming, delivered on a mobile platform for a mobile first continent.

We currently offer all content in 4 widely spoken African languages, and have just set up an Arabic content office in Dubai to expand our North African following. We also have a match data collection platform.

Being part of the East African community, we have a deep understanding of its people, culture, and love of football. We began our journey by focusing on building community through low data use platforms such as Facebook, which have provided a huge foothold for us in East and North Africa. 

Mobile simplicity and trusted original African content helped build our vibrant online community. Integration with established mobile providers, data collection and Africa's first daily fantasy football platform will continue our exponential growth over the coming years.
high_concept: Africa's Football Community
markets: Social Media, Fantasy Sports, Emerging Markets, Soccer

name: Yambi Animation Studios
product_desc:
Yambi Animation Studios creates animated content for children in Rwanda and around the world. 

Families around the world appreciate and enjoy sharing stories with their children with characters, settings and values that represent their culture and beliefs. They do this by telling stories or reading books or showing cartoons and films to their children. Rwandan families are no different, however the content available to them is limited. Most of the children in Rwanda that have access to children’s programming on television and in the cinema will only ever watch foreign content. 

Yambi Animation Studios was founded in June 2014 to meet this gap in the market. We create cartoons and animated films specifically targeting Rwandan children but which children throughout the continent and the world can enjoy. In addition to creating new content, we also train new animators and work with local artists and writers.
high_concept: Telling Stories. Creating Storytellers.
markets: Mobile, Television, K-12 Education

name: HOZIYANA GROUP
product_desc:
In line with the Government of Rwanda’s commitment to increase nationwide access to ICT, The country has completed the rollouts of fiber optic cable. The use of technology was also extended to all sectors. For example:
 
-E-Soko: (Literally E-market)  
-E-government: 
- E-tax:  

With all these above, Rwanda offers a strong environment of doing business, particularly in ICT sector. It's now our time with E-Business. 
In 2011, we have designed and put online a website in full kinyarwand (our mother tongue), aimed to allow users to do business online (http://www.cyamunara.com), not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. Individuals and Companies are using this website to buy/sell parts and supplies from other companies and other individuals, and collaborate on sales promotions. We also have a shop of ICT equipments sold either through our website or directly from the shop.
high_concept: E- BUSINESS IN RWANDA / Search Online, Buy online, pay online. receive at home.
markets: Enterprise Software, E-Commerce, Computers
